content: Connect a web search engine to enhance AI chats with real-time information from the internet. Once configured, it will be available to all users in {{productName}}.

comment.text: This text explains how connecting a web search engine enhances AI chats by providing real-time internet information within {{productName}}. It appears as a description in the AI settings portal, informing users about the feature's functionality. Translators should ensure the description clearly conveys the benefit of integrating a search engine.
